casebody.data:
POOR SUBSTITUTE TRUSTEE, LTD.
v.
FRANKLIN 293P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 31, 2017 Rita Franklin, for Franklin, Guy E., et al. D. Kyle Deak, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Poor Substitute Trustee, LTD.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th of August 2017 by Defendants for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 31st of August 2017."
